column2:
"Don't tell me you can't do it?
It's been quite a while since I last called you a loser."

"I don't think today's menu is that
difficult for you."

"The Seashore, Mining Site and Seabed.
These are the areas of exploration that
are available now! They are easy, right?"

"So go on and do your best!
<%me>!"

"できないなんて言わないわよね？
へっぽこぴーなんて呼ばれてたのも
もう大昔だもんね。"

"今回のメニュー
そんなに難しくないと思うのよね。"

"海岸、採掘場跡、海底。
最近解放されたエリアの探索！
ね、難しくないでしょ？"
